column2: [Organisation List]Number of rows in one page is 14 instead of 15.
1. Click [Organisation] tab on menu bar and check number of data rows in grid view control.
column4: System should display 15 records/page by default.

column2: [Add Organisation]Untitled pop up when clicking on Look up button next to Lead Contact text box.
1. On Organisation List, click on Look up button next to Lead Contact text box.
column3:
System displays an untitled pop up. See picture in sheet Test Evidence #1 for more details.
Similar issue when clicking on Look up button next to Type of Business text box.
column4: System should displays pop up with title "<Page name> -- Web page dialog"

column2:
Pre-condition: there are at least one active organisation which name starts with letter "N" in database.
Steps:
1. Click on hyperlink "N" in filter area
column4: System should reload and show active Organisation which name begin with the letter "N" (both upper case and lower case).
